subject: Re: [junit] Generating Reports
msgSnippet: If you use Ant to run your JUnit tests, you can use the  task after establishing a set of text-based or XML-based results. -- Stephen Smith, MEng
messageBody:
If you use Ant to run your JUnit tests, you can use the <junitreport>
task after establishing a set of text-based or XML-based results.

--
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/

Prasad wrote:
> Hi Everybody,
>
> Can we generate test result reports(text or html) using junit ?
>
> With regards
> Vara Prasad
